title: Corridor: The minimum width of a common corridor shall be as shown in Table No 16 hereunder
clause_text: Corridor: The minimum width of a common corridor shall be as shown in Table No 16 hereunder. Provided that any corridor identified as an exit (vide Regulations 47) shall also conform the requirements therein.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Corridor: The minimum width of a common corridor shall be as shown in Table No 16 hereunder. Provided that any corridor identified as an exit (vide Regulations 47) shall also conform the requirements
